entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET 9 Preview not working on android #24761
  • [regression/8.0.80] [Android] ObjectDisposedException with AndroidX.AppCompat.Widget.AppCompatImageView #24757
  • MAUI BlazorWebView fails to establish WebRTC connection on Android due to insecure host (https://0.0.0.0) #24755
  • Migrate to OnBackPressedCallback #24752
    Backlog
  • Android native dialog accessibility #24749
    Backlog
  • Add IsVisible to MenuItem in Shell #24748

Closed

  • Icons in Shell TabBar and AppBar are no longer updated after changing the UserAppTheme #20243
    Backlog
  • ToolbarItem font icon color not updating with AppThemeBinding #23201
    Backlog
  • ToolbarItem icon doesn't work with MVVM Binding on iOS #20508
    Backlog
  • The DataTrigger in the CollectionView inside the Popup doesn't work correctly when scrolling #24655
    Backlog
  • DataTrigger styles do not override element styles #24750
    Backlog
  • Extend the button class with a 'content' button #24747
  • Permissions.CheckStatusAsync not working first time #23035
  • [iOS/Android] Setting Background to null will not update rendering (for example Label.Background = null after it was set to Yellow stays Yellow) #24725
  • My Splash screen is not working in ios after upgrade to net8.0 #23736
  • VisualElement.ToPlatform(mauiContext) fails when using `UseMauiCompatibility()` #21644
  • DEP1000 Error on Maui Project #24544

PullRequests

Created

  • [ci] Uitests on Azure Pipelines #24765
  • Adds a rendering performance test #24762
    community ✨
  • Add Padding for iOS Buttons in some scenarios #24760
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-button
  • [net9.0] Update merge main net9 #24759
  • Compressed layout is back (maybe?) #24758
    community ✨
  • [xaml] fix potential NRE in `{Binding}` #24756
  • Fixed Flickering Issue When Toggling WebView Visibility on Android #24753
    community ✨

Merged

  • [ci] Use our own pool #24754
  • [C] Add ImageSource as LogicalChildren of MenuItem #24688
    area-xaml
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8 #24206
    area-infrastructure

Updated

  • [Localization] Remove check not allowing translations to run on net9.0 #24724
    area-localization
  • Improve measure invalidation and legacy Layout(s) performance #24532
    area-layout, community ✨
  • Improve keyboard scrolling with editors, contentInsets, and different keyboards #24589
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-entry, area-controls-scrollview, area-keyboard
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9.0 #24691
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
  • [net9.0][Enhancement][iOS] Add a done button to entry #24645
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • [iOS] Custom font icon is not rendered in a shell tabbar tab #24721
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [Android] IndicatorView with DataTemplate (custom image) does not render correctly when ItemsSource change #24717
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [testing] Fix CollectionView2 UITests #24471
    area-controls-collectionview, area-testing
  • Setting Background to null will update rendering on Android and iOS #24726
    area-theme
  • Fix Frame offsets inner content view by 1pt #24582
    community ✨, area-controls-frame, s/pr-needs-author-input
  • [Windows] Skip initial assignments in property mapper (take 3) #23987
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-core-platform
